data.comment: The match is underway at Stade des Costieres.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Nimes Nice attack through Jeff Reine-Adelaide. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 3, Sidy Sarr's header is off-target for Nimes.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nice a goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Amine Gouiri of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Nimes to check on Loick Landre, who is grimacing with pain.
Kelyan Guessoum (Nimes) has replaced the possibly injured Loick Landre.
In the minute 8, Nice to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 9, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nice have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nice throw-in in Nimes's half.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nimes defenders.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Nimes.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Nimes's Nolan Roux attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 16, Free kick Nice.
Nice needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Nimes are pushing forward but Haris Duljevic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Nice at Stade des Costieres.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nimes's Florian Miguel misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 24, Nice drives forward and Jeff Reine-Adelaide gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Nimes's area.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice pushes forward through Robson Bambu, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Nimes in the half of Nice.
Nice's Morgan Schneiderlin has been booked in Nimes.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Nimes.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Florian Miguel of Nimes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes's Niclas Eliasson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Nice.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Nice have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Nimes to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 40, Nolan Roux for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nice have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 41, Nice are coming forward and Rony Lopes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
Nimes advance rapidly upfield but Ruddy Buquet blows for offside.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ruddy Buquet blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 47, Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nimes have a goal kick.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 50, Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Nimes.
Nimes's Nolan Roux is on target but unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 52, Ruddy Buquet awards Nimes a goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Nice throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 55, Ruddy Buquet signals a Nice throw-in in Nimes's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Patrick Burner.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Nice.
Morgan Schneiderlin in Nice has been yellow-carded a second time by Ruddy Buquet and is being sent off.
In the minute 57, Nimes's Patrick Burner looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Nolan Roux (Nimes) has received a first yellow card.
Ruddy Buquet awards Nimes a goal kick.
Nice to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Ruddy Buquet awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Nice have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Amine Gouiri (Nice) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
In the minute 66, Nice have a goal kick.
Nimes's Matteo Ahlinvi breaks free at Stade des Costieres. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In the minute 67, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 68, Rony Lopes for Nice drives towards goal at Stade des Costieres. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Dan Ndoye is on a sub for Hassane Kamara for Nice.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Stanley N`Soki (Nice) gets in a strike – but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Sidy Sarr (Nimes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 74, Nice have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Nimes's Haris Duljevic is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
In the minute 78, Nimes's Matteo Ahlinvi gets in a shot on goal at Stade des Costieres. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Nimes.
In the minute 79, Ruddy Buquet awards Nice a goal kick.
The away team replace Rony Lopes with Alexis Claude-Maurice.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a second substitution, with Moussa Kone replacing Nolan Roux.
Nice are coming forward and Alexis Claude-Maurice gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
In the minute 85, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Dan Ndoye.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Nice.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 89, Nimes make their third substitution with Renaud Ripart replacing Niclas Eliasson.
Nassim Chadli is replacing Haris Duljevic for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
The home team have replaced Patrick Burner with Sofiane Alakouch. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Nimes.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Nice have a goal kick.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Andy Pelmard is replacing Amine Gouiri for the away team.
It's now 0-2 in Nimes as Alexis Claude-Maurice scores for Nice.
